contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox person | name = Yumi Takada | image = <!-- only free-content images are allowed for depicting living people. Non-free and "fair use" images, e.g. promo photos, CD/DVD covers, posters, screen captures, etc., will be deleted - see [[WP:NONFREE]] --> | caption = | birthname = | birth_date = {{Birth date and age|1961|9|21}} | birth_place = [[Tokyo]], [[Japan]] | death_date = | death_place = | othername = | occupation = [[Seiyū|Voice actress]] | yearsactive = 1979-present | spouse = | domesticpartner = | website = }} {{nihongo|'''Yumi Takada'''|高田 由美|Takada Yumi|born September 21, 1961 in [[Tokyo]]}} is a Japanese [[Seiyū|voice actress]] employed by [[81 Produce]]. ==Notable voice roles== *Apis Mellitus in [[Kamen Rider Agito]] *[[Ayeka Masaki Jurai]] in [[Tenchi Muyo!]] *Ayeka Takada (OVA)/Romio (TV), Ghost Girl (TV; episode 8) in [[Pretty Sammy]] *Etsuko in [[Hanappe Bazooka]] *Hatsuho Kazami in [[Please Teacher!]] *Hiroe Ogawa in [[F3 (anime)]] (uncredited) *Saeko in [[Twin Dolls]] *Ash in [[Demon Beast Invasion]] *Kayo in [[Demon Beast Invasion]] *Megumi in [[Urotsukidoji]] *Nurse in [[Urotsukidoji]] *Yumi in [[Urotsukidoji]] *Alector in [[Urotsukidoji]] *Midori in [[Adventure Kid]] *Jennifer Portman in [[This Ugly Yet Beautiful World]] *Midori-sensei in [[Ranma ½]] *Noriko Okamachi/Sailor Ojo (ep 178) in [[Sailor Stars]] *Shelley Godwin in [[Xenosaga]] *Shikijou Saori in [[Mahoromatic]] *[[Yoshinaga-sensei]] in [[Crayon Shin-chan]] *Yumi in [[Immoral Sisters]] ==External links== *[http://www.usagi.org/~doi/seiyuu/takada-yumi Yumi Takada] at the Seiyuu database * {{ann|people|2079}} *[http://www.81produce.co.jp/list.cgi?lady+3111317362000 81 Produce] {{Persondata <!-- Metadata: see [[Wikipedia:Persondata]]. --> | NAME = Takada, Yumi | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = | SHORT DESCRIPTION = Japanese actor | DATE OF BIRTH = September 21, 1961 | PLACE OF BIRTH = [[Tokyo]], [[Japan]] | DATE OF DEATH = | PLACE OF DEATH = }} {{DEFAULTSORT:Takada, Yumi}} [[Category:1961 births]] [[Category:81 Produce|Takada Yumi]] [[Category:Japanese voice actresses]] [[Category:Living people]] [[Category:People from Tokyo]] {{japan-voice-actor-stub}}
